## cu config list

List all configuration settings

### Synopsis

Display all current configuration settings.

```
cu config list [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/cu/config.yml)
      --debug           enable debug mode

```
